steps.step: Heat oil in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
Add turkey wings, giblets, and neck; saut 15 minutes or until well browned. Cover and reduce heat to low; cook 5 minutes. Stir in onion and celery; cover and cook 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.

Add 8 cups water; bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 30 minutes. Strain broth through a fine sieve into a large bowl; discard solids. Cool to room temperature. Cover and chill 8 hours or overnight. Skim solidified fat from surface of broth; discard.
